title: Diode array
description: This is the protective diode array.

title: SCRs
description:
This is the silicon controlled rectifier (scr) bank. These are solid state controllers for discharging the compacitors into the secondary and tertiary coils.

Click for more detials.

title: Chargers
description: This stack of serries connected camera fhash chargers charge up the capicators. With a good source of power this takes several seconds. Once the capicators are at capicaty the lights will glow red. Voltage is monitored with the voltmeeter

title: Battery Bank
description: These batteries supply 1.5V of power to the charging circuits.

title: Voltage of Capacitor Bank
description: This voltmeeter monitors the charge of the capicators.

title: Control group
description:
The controll group has the basic controll functionality.
  • Capacitor charge
  • Trip circuit power
  • Discharge trigger

title: Capacitor Bank
description:
This is the capicator bank. It has 3 banks of 160uf, 350v capicators under the protectve cover.
  • Bank 1: 1280uf (8 caps)
  • Bank 2: 640uf (4caps)
  • Bank 3: 480uf (3 caps)

Click for more detials.

title: Breech
description: The projectiles are loaded here. Markers indicate depth that the bolt is inserted into the Primary Coil.

title: Primary Coil
description: The primary coil is the first coil to accelerate the projectile. This is the largest energy level and is tuned to utilize JULES HERE jules

title: Secondary Coil
description: The seccondary coil is triggered by Trigger A and is tuned to utilize JULES HERE jules.

title: Tertiary Coil
description: This third coil is the least powerfull coil, triggered by Trigger B. It is tuned to utilize JULES HERE jules.

title: Bolts
description:
Example Projectiles. Any slug of ferous material will work. These are nails.

Click for more detials.

title: Controll Logic
description: This is the logic circirty for the optical triggers.
